New Records: Gous-Harmeet put on 91, the second highest partnership for the sixth wicket in all T20Is.
Quinton de Kock scored his highest score of the tournament, 74.
Key Match Events: Steven Taylor hit sixes to kick off the chase impressively.
Kagiso Rabada dismissed Steven Taylor with a caught-and-bowled wicket.
USA's bowlers conceded 148 runs in 12 overs, with several key moments in the chase.
Pre-Game Insights: USA bowled first, captained by Aaron Jones due to Monank Patel's injury.
South Africa opted to play two spinners, leading to Ottneil Baartman's exclusion.
The batting order included Tristan Stubbs and Heinrich Klaasen, known for their high strike rates.
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa's players and experts highlighted the victory as a strong team performance.
USA showed resilience despite the loss, with notable performances from key players.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a batter-friendly surface, influencing the scoring strategies.
USA's progress in the tournament was noted, considering their status as an Associate team.
Others: Ottneil Baartman's calm under pressure and effective bowling were highlighted as standout performances.
